item.description:
Self-Guided tour of the Winslow Homer exhibit in the Lower Rotunda; followed by MFA First Fridays in the Koch Gallery.

Update: Those wishing to arrive early and tour other exhibits, please meet Jim at the wall opposite the box office at 6:00. There's so much more to see! Jim will be wearing a name tag. The rest of us will meet in front of "The Lookout - All's Well" (See photo inset) at 7:00.
See you there.
Steve

The Winslow Homer exhibit includes "Boys in a Pasture", "The Lookout - All's Well" and "Driftwood" as well as the oil sketch "The Dinner Horn" and its related print and two Civil War works. Exhibit ends December 31st.

Followed by MFA First Fridays in the Koch Gallery. Sensational cocktails, delicious tapas menu, fine art, a glorious Museum setting, and live music.

Museum of Fine Arts, Boston

Members FREE
Adults $17
item.name: Winslow Homer & Cocktails at MFA
